title: Personal Finance App
responsibilities: Developed a .NET Web API using Entity Framework (EF) for data access and SQLite as the relational database, ensuring efficient data management and retrieval.

Built a dynamic and responsive web application with .NET Blazor WebAssembly, integrating JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap for a seamless user interface, and efficiently retrieving data from the API via RESTful services.
Deployed the Web API to Azure Web Services and the Web App to Azure Static Web Apps, utilizing CI/CD pipelines through GitHub Actions Workflows to ensure smooth and automated deployments.

title: Portfolio Website
responsibilities: Developed a dynamic website using .NET Blazor WebAssembly, efficiently retrieving and displaying information from structured JSON files to ensure a seamless user experience.
Created a comprehensive Razor Class Library featuring reusable UI components with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and integrated it into the project as a Git submodule for easy management and updates.
Deployed the website to GitHub Pages using automated GitHub Actions, ensuring a smooth and continuous deployment process with minimal manual intervention.

title: Resume Builder Website
responsibilities: Developing a web application using ASP.NET Model-View-Controller (MVC) framework, Entity Framework (EF) for data access, and SQLite as the relational database to ensure efficient data management and retrieval.
Designing and implemented a custom authorization and authentication system, providing secure user access and protecting sensitive information.
Implementing comprehensive user profile management features, allowing users to create, update, and delete their resumes efficiently, with an intuitive and user-friendly interface.
Integrating jQuery and AJAX to support asynchronous updates, enhancing user experience by preventing constant page reloads and improving overall application responsiveness.
